com.facebook.buck.support.cli.config

Class BuckConfigWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.support.cli.config.BuckConfigWriter

  • public class BuckConfigWriter
extends Object
    Simple class that writes out the BuckConfig to a file for a specific invocation

      static void writeConfig(Path rootPath, InvocationInfo info, BuckConfig config)

    • Method Detail

      • writeConfig

        public static void writeConfig(Path rootPath,
                               InvocationInfo info,
                               BuckConfig config)
                        throws IOException
        Writes the configuration out to a standard location as json for a specific command

        Currently this is of the form: 

           {
     "settings": {
       "section": {
         "key": "value"
         "key2": "value2"
       },
       "other_section": {
         "key3": "value3",
         "key4": "true"
     }
   }
        In the future, the source of each setting will be visible with a structure like this: 
           {
     "settings": {
       "section": {
         "key": "value"
         "key2": "value2"
       },
       "other_section": {
         "key3": "value3",
         "key4": "true"
     },
     "sources": {
       "$path_to_config_file": {
         "section": {
           "key": "value"
           "key2": "value2"
         }
       }
     }
   }
        Parameters:
        rootPath - The root of the project that contains buck-out
        info - The invocation info. Used to find the log directories to write into
        config - The configuration to write to disk
        Throws:
        IOException - The file could not be written to
